response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both parties. Considering its high quality and the significant benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,000. This represents a special discount designed to acknowledge your interest and commitment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you.", "product_price": 11000}
